item.title: Bunny’s Rent-a-Mom Agency
item.description:
Title: Bunny’s Rent-a-Mom Agency
Genre: Adventure , Casual
Developer: Atelier KAGUYA
Publisher: Shiravune
Release Date: Feb 25, 2026




About This Game

GAMEPLAY & FEATURES

Medium-length visual novel with multiple heroines

Lush artwork, generous event scenes, and 2D anime-style sprites

Warm hugs, a clean apartment, and sagely motherly advice

Fully voiced by a veteran cast of professional Japanese VAs

STORY

After losing his mother a few years ago, Ayato Hirose has been living alone with his dad, Masa, until Masa is suddenly sent overseas for two months over summer break.

Worried about leaving Ayato alone, they turn to a trusted neighbor, Rinko Ninomiya, for help. She points them toward a housekeeping agency—but not just any agency.

Bunny’s Moms specializes in warm, caring women who act as temporary “mothers,” providing head pats, home-cooked meals, and a whole lot of healing. To Ayato’s surprise, the first to arrive is none other than Rinko herself… now officially his new mom!

Soon, more women arrive at his door: Kiyoko, the dependable childhood friend; Kana, the confident head of the agency; and Tsumugi, a sweet, flustered newlywed still learning the ropes. Each brings her own brand of motherly affection into Ayato’s once-quiet home.

This summer, a new kind of household begins to take root... one full of comfort, surprises, and more than a little heart.

CHARACTERS

Rinko Ninomiya

Tou Ariga

Literally the mom next door, Rinko lives in the apartment next to Ayato and his dad’s. Known around the neighborhood for her warm, motherly nature, she’s something of a local celebrity mom already.

She’s known Ayato since he was little and fusses over him like he were her own. And in a way, she wishes he were...

Though she has a young son herself, he wants nothing to do with her pampering, so all that untapped motherly affection is ready to be unleashed. Thanks to Bunny’s, her longtime soft spot for Ayato is about to become a full-on smothering.

Kana Jodohama

Kaoru Momozono

CEO of the rent-a-mom agency Bunny’s Moms, although when short on staff, she doesn’t hesitate to roll up her sleeves and step in herself.

At first glance, she seems cool and a little intimidating, but don’t be fooled. She’s calm, composed, and surprisingly open-minded. She’s also competent in every area of homemaking, but her perfectionist streak means she’ll happily take notes from anyone better.

With her husband working overseas and almost never home, she’s more or less living the solo life. Maybe, just maybe, she’s looking for someone to fill the quiet...

Kiyoko Oda

Ren Haruna

The lovely wife at long-beloved local bathhouse Oda Springs Eternal. She helps out at the front desk from time to time, but most of the heavy lifting is handled by her husband and in-laws. To pitch in with the family finances and get a little break from full-time mom duty, she decides to sign up with Bunny’s.

Kiyoko and Ayato go way back—he used to greet her every morning on his way to school, and their relationship has always felt a bit like a big-sister-little-brother dynamic. Her two daughters adore Ayato too, so everything’s been smooth sailing thus far...

Still, Kiyoko’s always had a quiet longing: she wants to raise a son of her own. So when the chance to spoil Ayato comes along, she’s more than ready to play the doting mom he’s never had.

Tsumugi Kido

Musubi Aono

A newlywed whose husband was sent off on a year-long solo assignment just six months after the wedding.

To stave off her loneliness and prep for the baby they promised to make when he gets back, she joins Bunny’s for a little hands-on parenting practice.

Tsumugi’s still new to the job, and with her naturally playful, slightly childish personality, she struggles to act more like a “mom” than a big sister. But she's trying her best, even if “motherhood” isn’t as easy as she thought...

Ayato Hirose

—

A second-year at Ouba Academy, Ayato lost his mother at a young age and has been living alone with his dad ever since. To support his always-busy old man, he’s taken charge of the cooking, cleaning, and general home upkeep.

Though he puts on a capable front, Ayato secretly longs to be mothered again and finds himself drawn to the warm, idealized image of the mom next door, Rinko.

With youthful, almost girlish good looks that get him doted on by people of all ages, Ayato can’t help but feel a little self-conscious about just how adorable everyone seems to think he is...

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

A gentle, character-driven comedy exploring loss, care, and broken family stereotypes, centered on an adult seeking connection through a fictional maid service.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: 1.5 GHz or faster
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1280×720, High Color
    • DirectX: Version 9.0c
    • Additional Notes: Windows 95/98SE/Me/2000/XP/Vista/7/8 and NEC PC-9800 series are not supported.
    Recommended:
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1280×720, Full Color (24-bit) or better

item.title: Dice A Million
item.description:
Title: Dice A Million
Genre: Indie , Strategy
Developer: countlessnights
Publisher: 2 Left Thumbs
Release Date: Feb 25, 2026




About This Game

You like big numbers? Sure, got you covered.

Dice A Million is a roguelike deckbuilder about rolling dice to try and get to a million points. That's the whole point . (get it?!)

You're trapped in this dice rolling facility, so let's get rolling and try to escape. Combine the effects of more than 120 different dice and discover powerful synergies . Get through ever-increasing debts and challenging bosses that will require perfect symbiosis in your bag in order to be beaten.

Will you be able to push luck to your side?

The game is called " Dice A Million " but dice alone won't get you anywhere far. Gear up your hand with more than 80 unique rings with that will act as your passive items. They're always active and trigger wacky effects in your dice. Get a bunch of them and you'll be hitting those dopamine receptors sooner than later!

And most importantly...

Break the game (It is one of those)

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: 11, 10, 8, 7, Vista
    • Processor: 2.0 GHz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: 1 GB RAM
    • Storage: 30 MB available space

item.title: Nested Lands
item.description:
Title: Nested Lands
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , RPG , Simulation , Early Access
Developer: 1M Bits Horde
Publisher: META Publishing
Franchise: META Publishing
Release Date: Feb 25, 2026
Early Access Release Date: Feb 25, 2026




About This Game

Nested Lands is a multiplayer settlement-building RPG set in a dark, plague-ravaged world where twisted madmen and bandits roam the land. Your life will depend on how well you manage and grow your settlement. Fortunately, you're not alone in this dark world — your peasants will help you gather resources, craft items, and build defenses as you lead them through danger and privation. But remember, every choice you make has consequences and can lead your village to prosperity or a senseless death from the plague.

Start from a clean slate and build a brand-new civilization. Assign each peasant a specific role and order them to build, craft, or gather the resources you need to survive the hardships you will face. With dozens of upgradable buildings and hundreds of items to craft and customize, including farms and animals, you're free to shape your settlement as you see fit. But don't let your growing dynasty blind you — hostile forces lurk nearby, ready to spill your blood.

The only way to break through the endless darkness of Nested Lands is to gather the other survivors who share your plight, but have yet to fully give up hope. Save and recruit peasants during your journey across the world. But keep in mind that they will need your protection.
Harsh weather and the coming winter are also your sworn enemies, and the highly detailed world full of random events won’t grant you a single moment’s rest.

Start from nothing. Rise from the bottom, overcome monumental challenges, and make your fame echo across the Nested Lands. But be careful - all your decisions will be carefully watched and evaluated. Will your name be praised by all, or will its very sound instill fear into the common folk who dwell in this open world? The choice is yours.

The disfigured nature of the world makes survival even more challenging. Before facing other threats, you need to secure the basics — a lack of medicine can wipe your village out faster than any blade. Craft, improve your skills, and endure the harsh reality of Nested Lands. Brutal weather and the coming winter may be your greatest foes, but random encounters won't offer any respite.

Play your way - explore the Nested Lands alone, or embrace the horrors of this dystopian world with your friends in co-op mode.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

The game includes an option to customize the characters and body parts of the characters, including the genitals. This is an optional inclusion and is not a default one.

Also, the game includes gore and blood scenes, including cutting the human body.



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10 and above
    • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 or higher
    • Memory: 16 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 4GB or higher
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 15 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 11
    • Processor: Core i5 or better
    • Memory: 32 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 4050 or higher
    • DirectX: Version 12
    • Storage: 15 GB available space

item.title: They Killed Your Cat
item.description:
Title: They Killed Your Cat
Genre: Action , Casual , Indie , Simulation
Developer: Vekaria
Publisher: Vekaria
Release Date: Feb 24, 2026




About This Game

Manually reload your weapons

Manually walk by controlling each leg

Customize your experience

Kill everything (No survivors)

Each weapon features unique reload mechanics

Manually save your progress

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this:

Game consists of violence and blood



System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Intel Core i5
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 4 GB available space
    Recommended:
    • OS: Windows 10/11
    • Processor: Inter Core i7
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 or equivalent
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 4 GB available space

item.title: Rise of Piracy
item.description:
Title: Rise of Piracy
Genre: Action , Adventure , Indie , Simulation , Strategy , Early Access
Developer: IrishJohnGames
Publisher: MicroProse Software
Franchise: Rise of Piracy
Release Date: Feb 24, 2026
Early Access Release Date: Feb 24, 2026




About This Game

Rise of Piracy focuses heavily on progression and growth. In your campaign, you will first be given a small ship and a handful of coin. Complete missions and find treasure to build your economic strength and relations with the other factions. You can also choose to fight, boarding or sinking other vessels for loot. Build up your fleet of ships and their crews to take on the most challenging tasks such as capture islands of various strength and composition. Defeating large colonial fleets in grand scale naval warfare. Hunt pirates or long lost treasures. Uncovering mysterious lands filled with dangers as you go.

Campaign Sandbox

Everything in Rise of Piracy is carefully hand-crafted to be a new experience and challenge, no procedural generation. Every building in is destructible, allowing you to level an island from afar via bombardment from your fleet before sending your crews as landing parties to conquer them. Talk to mayors of settlements and captains of fleets to uncover hidden lands, or find them yourself through exploration and investigation.

Create your Own Story

Piracy is optional. Choose to trade with over 200 commodities that can be found scattered around the world. Ports with specialized trading routes and dedicated merchants to trade with. Add trading ships to your fleet to maximize your transportation potential. Build relations with other factions to increase your trading effectiveness. Engaging in war, hunting bounties, or seeking hidden treasures are also viable means of building your bank.

Forge Alliances

A deep diplomacy system allows relationships to grow between all factions. Engage in diplomacy with every faction you meet. NPC factions will go to war with one another and their assets will change hands. Changing the balance of powers can impact your play-style, increasing warship activity, and blocking trade routes.

Become the Threat

Fill your fleet with a large variety of playable ships from the 1600s - 1900s, from the light and fast Sloop to the tremendous firepower but limited maneuverability that comes with the 120 Gun ship of the Line. Taverns provide a great place to hire crewmen for your fleet. Fill your ships with specialized crew. Use them to board hostile ships, or invading and capturing islands to secure passive income. Hostile actions will have consequences amongst the factions - fleets of pirate hunters are constantly seeking bounties. Campaign difficulty will grow dynamically and remain challenging no matter how strong players get.

Descrierea conținutului pentru adulți indisponibilă.

System Requirements

Windows

    Minimum:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 64bit
    • Processor: Intel i5-2300/AMD FX-4300
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or similar
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 28 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    Recommended:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 11 64bit
    • Processor: Intel i7-4770/AMD FX-8350
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 3070ti or better
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 28 GB available space
    • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
